example.name: beam-break
example.description: Demonstration of how to break a beam down to the sixteenth-note level and how to indicate two triplet "3" marks on a beam. Beethoven piano sonata no. 5 in C minor, op. 10/1, mvmt. 2: Adagio molto.

file.name: break.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: break.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
